description.value:
Passage aboard a Void Craft, to another planet or star system. A Comfortable, more leasurely cruise that can get you where you want to go. Likely not a lot of room for cargo.

Requirements

Most well developed planets have easily locatable docks with indicated destinations and rates. For a specific location or more questionable cargo, more negotiation might be needed

Effect: Scarce

Notes: 2200 T
